Uses of Class
payroll.Employee

    • Uses of Employee in payroll

      Subclasses of Employee in payroll 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Fulltime
      The Fulltime class extends the employee class It includes specific data and operations of a full time employee
      class  Management
      The Management class extends the Fulltime class It includes specific data and operations of a management employee
      class  Parttime
      The Parttime class extends the Employee class It includes specific data and operations of a part time employee
      Fields in payroll declared as Employee 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Employee[] Company.emplist 
      Methods in payroll with parameters of type Employee 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Company.add(Employee employee)
      Adds the employee to the array of employees Before adding, the grow method is called to check if there is space in the array.
      void SampleController.addEmployee(Employee employee)
      This method calls the add function in the Company class to add the Employee.
      private int Company.find(Employee employee)
      Helper method to find a an employee in the company database Checks if the profile of the employee entered is equal to the profile of any of the employees already present in the array through the means of a for loop
      boolean Company.remove(Employee employee)
      Removes the employee from the array of employees The find method is called to check if the employee exists in the company database If the employee is found, the shiftArray method is called to get rid of the employee
      void Company.shiftArray(Employee[] emplist, int index)
      Helper method to move the elements of the array one index down to remove the employee from the array The employee at the index needs to be removed.
